title: Musk gets $7B backing for Twitter bid from tech heavyweights - ABC News
content: Musk gets $7B backing for Twitter bid from tech heavyweights  ABC News
description: Billionaire Elon Musk has strengthened the equity stake of his offer to buy Twitter with commitments of more than $7 billion from a range of investors, including Oracle co-founder and Tesla board member Larry Ellison
